attributes.action: Ask GP practices to return to face to face appointments
attributes.additional_details: Endless people are complaining about their GP's
attributes.background: Force GP's to return to face to face appointments instead of telephone appointments. If you are deaf a telephone appointment is if no use!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
